data.message:
You finally called us “stans”! ...  Well I'm proud to be one because this is the first time you actually named us STANS in your post!! 
!! Game is on, love you  Eminem!!

replies.message: Lol you gonna get drunk and murder your fiance and baby? Fuck yeah for the stans lol
You think Eminem actually is typing this stuff? No. It's his manager or whatever
Actually Eminem used to reply to his fans under his posts,I think I've even seen a reddit post about that some time ago.
He actually did in a previous post regarding the southpaw boxing gym.
Stans is an insult you dumb fucks

eminem is crazy man i remember reading his letter to tupuc's mom..........at the end he said if tupuc's mom does not like that letter she should go and fuck herself......he can even call us asholes...
Comedy Street Dance - " 2 Japanese Guys's Comedy Show "  :D https://youtu.be/SUEj_CBy4GE

If Slim Shady still existed, he would be rapping about how stupid his fans are for calling themselves "Stans". Eminem is one of the greatest artists ever, but he have one the worst fanbases... Calling yourselves like a character Eminem created to be exactly what he DOESN'T want his fans to be, how stupid can that be??? He certainly did not type out that shit!
I don't want me be called a stan and this is coming from a fan who died his hair all blonde in like 2002 lol..... eminem slim shady lp is still by far the best album ever then mmlp
Well said. You feel Emin3m? Listen to this ! https://soundcloud.com/jesyllable/j-e-syllable-other-side

EMINEM ROLE MODEL REMIX #Monstermode #MTs #Followme
https://www.facebook.com/jaysaint.dasynnr/videos/vb.1594779507467415/1661583444120354/?type=3&theater

iTunes: http://apple.co/1LyrHUJ

Yeah, I kno that so many of us r callin themselves "Stans" n it's ok, if we're not treatin that seriously, but I agree that  connectin it with the main fucked up hero of the song "Stan" isn very good at all, so instead that, without spontaneous connections better will b callin ourselves just "Eminem fans" ✌
